title: Downtown 2BR near SJSU
shortDesc: Bright 2BR walkable to campus and restaurants.
longDesc: Updated unit with hardwood floors, natural light, and a quiet building. Ideal for two students or a small family. 10-minute walk to SJSU and downtown cafés.

title: Private Room in Shared 3BR
shortDesc: Furnished private room in a friendly student house.
longDesc: Spacious shared home with weekly cleaning rotation. Utilities split. 6-minute walk to SJSU. Great for first-time renters.

title: Studio with Balcony
address: 95 E San Salvador St, San Jose, CA 95112
shortDesc: Modern studio, balcony, and in-building laundry.
longDesc: Compact studio perfect for solo living. Secure entry and elevator. Balcony faces a quiet courtyard. 8-minute walk to SJSU.

title: 1BR with Workspace Pro Setup
longDesc: Dedicated workspace, blackout curtains, and great sound insulation. Perfect for remote study or late-night coding.

title: Cozy 2BR Corner Unit
shortDesc: Corner unit with tons of light and storage.
longDesc: Large living room, updated kitchen, and quiet neighbors. Easy bike ride to SJSU and shops.

title: Minimalist Studio Near Campus
address: 140 E San Fernando St, San Jose, CA 95112
longDesc: Clean lines and smart storage built-ins. Steps from cafés and library. Ideal for a focused study vibe.

title: Premium Room + Private Bath
shortDesc: Large furnished room with en-suite bathroom.
longDesc: In a 4BR shared home. Weekly housekeeping of common areas included. Friendly student house.

title: Smart Home 1BR
shortDesc: Smart plugs, thermostat, and lighting included.
longDesc: Voice-controlled lighting, smart thermostat, and energy-efficient appliances. Walk to campus in under 10 minutes.

title: 3BR Share with Big Kitchen
shortDesc: Spacious kitchen and open common area.
longDesc: Ideal for a group of friends. Large fridge, ample counter space, and patio for weekend hangs.

title: Clean 1BR with Parking
shortDesc: Well-kept unit with assigned parking spot.
longDesc: Great value 1BR close to campus. Quiet complex with responsive maintenance.
